metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5732 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: none. Reason: This candidate was in a CNA pool that was not assigned to any issues during 2017. Notes: none.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> per Intel, this turned out to not be an issue after all.

criterions.comment: edk2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
